name: Without One of Us
description:
This is a gamejam game. 

Done in 48 hours. 

Controls

TAB: Change character.

WASD / Arrows: Movement & Jump

Alpha1, Alpha2(1 and 2 on keyboard): Build block big or small. Only works with Dwarf

Mouse1: Move block. Only works with Tough Guy.

Features:

Tough Guy = Can move object with mouse.

Dwarf = Can go under 1 x1  area and build blocks.

Explorer = Give light on map.
